tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE monitoring_systems (   system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   system_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,   cpu_utilization DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,   memory_utilization DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,   disk_utilization DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,   alert_threshold DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  alert_message TEXT,
  alert_level VARCHAR(20),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE resource_utilization_monitoring (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(50),
    usage_percent FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    severity VARCHAR(10),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    resource_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE alerts_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
